commentBody:
It does definitely seem like Trump is planning to pretend there isn't any such thing as a Department of State. Don't really need one, if you're the world's biggest negotiating genius. No need for anything so nefarious as a private email server - just conduct everything on your personal phone.

Just another example of The Way of Trump: if you're going to insult people's intelligence, do it on a grand scale and they'll think you're a genius.
